title: #13 Nick Quah (Hot Pod): Gen Z musicians, sports journalism, video game design
itunes:title: Nick Quah (Hot Pod): Gen Z musicians, sports journalism, video game design
description:
Nick Quah has been chronicling the growth of the podcasting industry since 2014 in his email newsletter, https://hotpodnews.com/ (Hot Pod), and he also offers up regular podcast recommendations in the Vulture newsletter https://www.vulture.com/promo/sign-up-for-15-speed-podcast-newsletter.html (1.5x Speed). But he's not only listening to the big, prestigious shows you've heard of.
"One of my favorite things to do is to pick up a chat show about a subject that I know absolutely nothing about and just listen to people go at it," Nick says on today's episode of Follow Friday.
He also shares his complicated feelings about representation in Hollywood, what a YouTuber has taught him about the future of entertainment, why food and sports writing matter, and which chat podcast in particular he got hooked on recently. 
Follow us:
- Nick is https://twitter.com/nwquah (@nwquah) on Twitter
- This show is @followfridaypod on https://twitter.com/followfridaypod (Twitter) and https://www.instagram.com/followfridaypod/ (Instagram)
- Eric is https://twitter.com/heyheyesj (@heyheyesj) on Twitter
Who Nick follows:
- https://twitter.com/JustinCChang (Justin Chang)
- https://www.youtube.com/mxmtoon (mxmtoon)
- https://twitter.com/dannychau (Danny Chau)
- https://intothecast.online/ (Into the Aether)
Rate us: https://lovethepodcast.com/FollowFriday (LoveThePodcast.com/FollowFriday)
Advertise: https://followfridaypodcast.com/advertise (FollowFridayPodcast.com/Advertise)


Theme song written by Eric Johnson, and performed by https://www.fiverr.com/yonamarie (Yona Marie). Show art by https://www.fiverr.com/dodiihr (Dodi Hermawan). Additional music by https://starfrosch.com/ (starfrosch).

He also shares his complicated feelings about representation in Hollywood, what a YouTuber has taught him about the future of entertainment, why food and sports writing matter, and which chat podcast in particular he got hooked on recently.
